hackathon-description-text: The activity from Friday morning until Saturday night nonstop, i.e. continuous programming for approximately 32 hours.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Everything is part of the internet of things now - from your phone to your fitness band to your thermostat. Build a hack that utilizes private data being collected from your devices, and show how you can turn potential vulnerabilities into something constructive. Prize: Collector's Edition of Watch Dogs 2
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Watch Dogs® 2 Best Device Privacy Hack
Best Use of Amazon Web Services

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 100% Scholarship for incubation in the Tecnológico de Monterrey Campus Cuernavaca incubator

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Paseos del Sol 104, San Miguel de La Unión, Chiconcuac, Mor., Mexico
hackathon-location-address: Paseos del Sol 104, San Miguel de La Unión, Chiconcuac, Mor., Mexico
hackathon-description-header: Create apps and awesome developments that enhance and create technology, but especially learn new things
hackathon-location-description: Tecnológico de Monterrey Campus Cuernavaca - Parque de Innovación y Emprendimiento
